turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you order me a coffee at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I'm heading towards the SB near our office on Mira Mesa Boulevard

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, can you get me a latte please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yup, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you also remember that I need fat free milk for that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it, fat free milk, latte. Is there anything else that you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you could also order me some breakfast that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the breakfast sandwich, I forgot what options they have

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll check when I get there

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you find out what they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like they ran out of sandwiches, but they do have muffins and scones

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a muffin, blueberry if it's available

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is! I'll grab you one along with your latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, will you bring it to the office for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, on the way there after ordering, I should be there in fifteen minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok sounds great, let me know if there are any issues there

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Looks like they have our account, so it's all good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok see you soon!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, your fat free milk latte and muffin are ordered and I'll see you in a bit
